name: Egyptian courgettes with dukkah sprinkle
description: Get four of your 5-a-day in one vegan dinner! This easy recipe is healthy and gluten-free, and provides calcium, folate, fibre, vitamin C and iron
ingredients: 1 tbsp rapeseed oil,2 onions ,2 tsp ground coriander,2 tsp smoked paprika,400g can chopped tomatoes,2 tsp vegetable bouillon powder,2 large courgettes,400g can butter beans,180g cherry tomatoes,160g frozen peas,15g coriander

name: Egyptian egg salad
description: Give salad a shake-up with an Egyptian-inspired recipe that combines fava beans with egg and the rich flavours of tahini, garlic, lemon and cumin
ingredients: 2 large eggs,1 lemon,1 tbsp tahini,1 tbsp rapeseed oil,1 red onion,3 large garlic cloves,1 tsp ground cumin,½ tsp cumin seeds,400g can borlotti or fava beans,2 Little Gem lettuces cut into wedges,2 tomatoes ,sprinkling of dried chilli flakes and roughly chopped flat-leaf parsley

name: Shakshuka
description: Shakshuka is an incredibly easy baked egg recipe that works just as well for brunch as it does for dinner. Smoky, sweet peppers combine with rich, creamy eggs and tangy yoghurt and salty feta for a completely moreish dish.
ingredients: 3 tbsp olive oil,2 large onions, thinly sliced,2 red peppers,2 green peppers, 4 garlic cloves,½ tsp cumin seeds,½ tsp caraway seeds,½ tsp cayenne pepper,1 tbsp tomato or red pepper purée,2 x 400g tins tomatoes,1 small bunch fresh coriander, 1 small bunch fresh parsley, 8 free-range eggs85g/3oz feta, 8 tbsp thick natural yoghurt or labneh,salt and freshly ground black pepper

name: Roast vegetable hummus with zhoug
description: This roast vegetable hummus is flavoured with cumin and topped with a zesty zhoug, more roasted vegetables and served with baked chapatis.
ingredients: ½ butternut squash,1 red onion, 1 red pepper, 2 x 400g tins chickpeas, olive oil,½ lemon, 1 garlic clove, pinch ground cumin,salt and freshly ground black pepper,1 garlic clove,½ lemon,½ tsp ground cumin,pinch chilli flakes,30g/1oz bunch fresh coriander

name: Classic Moussaka
description: An easy version of the classic Greek dish moussaka, cheesy and comforting...
ingredients: 500g pack lean minced beef,1 large aubergine,150g pot 0% Greek yogurt,1 egg,3 tbsp parmesan,400g can chopped tomato with garlic and herbs,4 tbsp sun-dried tomato purée,400g leftover boiled potato

name: Smoked Salmon Taramasalata
description: This Greek dip is an original way to use up leftover smoked salmon and works well on a sharing mezze platter
ingredients: 100g smoked salmon, 200g low-fat soft cheese,100g crème fraîche, juice 1 lemon, drizzle of olive oil,black kalamata olive and toasted pitta bread

name: Greek Salad
description: Make a fresh and colourful Greek salad in no time. It's great with grilled meats at a barbecue, or on its own as a veggie main
ingredients: 4 large vine tomatoes,1 cucumber,½ a red onion thinly sliced,16 Kalamata olives,1 tsp dried oregano,85g feta cheese,4 tbsp Greek extra virgin olive oil

name: Baklava
description: Our version of syrup-soaked baklava is gently spiced with cinnamon and cardamom, and has a blend of pecans, pistachios and walnuts
ingredients: 200g butter,200g pistachios,50g walnuts,50g pecans,3 tbsp honey,2 x 270g pack filo pastry,250g golden caster sugar,50g honey,2 tsp orange blossom water,½ tsp ground cinnamon,¼ tsp ground cardamom (from 3 pods)

name: Aubergine rolls with spinach & ricotta
description: This spin on Italian 'melanzane alla Parmigiana' is quick to prepare and makes a deliciously creamy, veggie bake
ingredients: 2 aubergines,2 tbsp olive oil,500g spinach,250g tub ricotta,grating of nutmeg,350g jar tomato sauce,4 tbsp fresh breadcrumb,4 tbsp parmesan (or vegetarian alternative)

name: Gnocchi with parsley, butter & samphire
description: Pass on the pasta and try making your own potato gnocchi - forage for samphire to make a fresh and frugal meat-free main
ingredients: 900g floury potatoes , roughly the same size or halved if large,50g salted butter,1 medium egg,225-280g plain white flour,100g salted butter,6 shallots ,3 garlic cloves, 200g samphire,2 small packs parsley

name: Pizza Margherita in 4 easy steps
description: Even a novice cook can master the art of pizza with our simple step-by-step guide. Bellissimo!
ingredients: 300g strong bread flour,1 tsp instant yeast (from a sachet or a tub),1 tsp salt,1 tbsp olive oil,100ml passata,handful fresh basil or 1 tsp dried,1 garlic clove,125g ball mozzarella,handful grated or shaved parmesan (or vegetarian alternative)

name: Chocolate, pistachio & nougat semifreddo
description: This traditional Italian ice cream bar is the perfect solution for an effortless frozen, creamy dessert
ingredients: 75g golden caster sugar,butter,4 medium eggs,250g dark chocolate,450ml double cream,140g hard nougat or torrone( chopped into 0.5cm chunks),50g pistachio

name: Chicken & chorizo rice pot
description: A one-pot chicken casserole for sharing, flavoured with Spanish sausage and slow-cooked with rice - an alternative paella
ingredients: 1 tbsp oil,8 chicken pieces or 1 whole chicken,1 large onion,1 red pepper,3 garlic cloves,225g chorizo,1 tbsp tomato purée,1 tbsp thyme leaf,150ml white wine,850ml chicken stock,400g long grain rice,2 tbsp chopped parsley

name: Paella
description: Think paella's too much of a challenge? Think again, this easy recipe makes it foolproof and is full of fantastic flavour
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,1 leek or onion,110g pack chorizo sausage,1 tsp turmeric,300g long grain rice,1l hot fish or chicken stock,200g frozen pea,400g frozen seafood mix

name: Chorizo & chickpea soup
description: Sizzling Chorizo & chickpea soup
ingredients: 400g can chopped tomato,110g pack of chorizo sausage,140g wedge Savoy cabbage,sprinkling dried chilli flakes,410g can chickpea,1 chicken or vegetable stock cube,crusty bread or garlic bread

name: Spanish fig & almond balls
description: A festive version of Pan de Higo, a dried fig cake that the Spanish traditionally eat with cheese and a drizzle of honey
ingredients: 100g whole almond ,500g pack dried whole fig ,85g dried apricot,50g dried cranberries,1 tbsp brandy,1 tbsp clear honey,1 tsp ground cloves,100g sesame seed

name: Spiced lamb & feta gozleme with special tomato sauce
description: A savoury Turkish pastry that's actually made with bread. Stuff with lamb, feta, raisins and pine nuts and serve with pomegranate dip
ingredients: 7g sachet fast-action dried yeast,1 tsp golden caster sugar,250g plain flour,2 tbsp olive oil,1 tbsp olive oil,500g pack lamb mince,2 garlic cloves ,2 tsp ground cumin,2 tsp ground coriander,1 tsp ground cinnamon,1 tsp mild chilli powder,50g raisin,zest 1 lemon,3 spring onions,50g toasted pine nut,100g feta cheese,8 tbsp tomato ketchup,2 tbsp pomegranate molasses,1 tbsp very finely chopped red onion

name: Turkish one-pan eggs & peppers
description: This gutsy dish is genuine street food and a brilliant family dish for brunch, lunch or supper.
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,2 onions ,1 red or green pepper,1-2 red chillies ,400g can chopped tomatoes,1-2 tsp caster sugar,4 eggs,small bunch parsley ,6 tbsp thick creamy yogurt,2 garlic cloves

name: Turkish lamb pilau
description: Serve up a basmati rice one pot flavoured with cinnamon, mint and apricot, studded with tender lamb
ingredients: small handful pine nuts or flaked almonds,1 tbsp olive oil,1 large onion,2 cinnamon sticks,500g lean lamb neck fillet,250g basmati rice,1 lamb or vegetable stock cube,12 ready-to-eat dried apricots,handful fresh mint leaves

name: Walnut, date & honey cake
description: A tea-time treat - packed with sweet honey. A great way to use up those ripe bananas too
ingredients: 225g self-raising flour,½ tsp ground cinnamon,175g softened butter,100g light muscovado sugar,3 tbsp clear honey,2 eggs ,2 medium ripe bananas about 250g/9oz total weight in their skins,100g stoned dates,50g pack walnut pieces
